entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Blowing snow along exposed areas of the coast this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight then southwest 20 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:36 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:36 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
